content: 1 jonatan tollow @madebytollow 2025 © #diamondbabyblanket contact info@madebytollow com diamond baby blanket the perfect baby blanket with a simple memorable pattern and a reversible finished projekt yarn shown sample knitted with cotton 8/8 julie from falk garn 85m 93yds /50g colorway greige you can use any other yarn with same yarn weight aran or any other yarn weight and adjust pattern needles 4 mm/us 6 40cm/16 long circular needles gauge 18 stitches x 25 row for 10x10 cm / 4 in pattern after blocking gauge is not important for fit but can affect yardage finished size 87cm/34 long and 59cm/23 wide measurements after blocking yardage 480m/525yds but adjustable if you have smaller/larger skeins tools tapestry needle for weaving in ends mats for blocking abbreviations rs right side k knit sl1wyif slip one stitch purlwise with yarn in front p purl ws wrong side r row pattern description the diamond baby blanket is worked flat with a simple garter stitch edging at the bottom on the sides as well as at the top the repeat is easily memorable and adjustable if you want to make the blanket bigger or smaller just add or remove 8 stitches as many times needed at cast on pattern cast on 107 sts using any method i ve used the long tail method over double needles r1 k106 sl1wyif turn work repeat r1 an additional 4 times r6 ws k5 pm k until 5 sts remains pm k4 sl1wyif turn work the markers are to remind you about the garter stitch edges they can be skipped pattern repeat knit chart below repeating r7-16 repeat until work measures 75-80cm ending on a r16 note that charts are always shown from rs when knitting ws make sure to check the key top edge makers can be removed as you knit as they are no longer needed knit another 3 garter stitch ridges as follows r17 k106 sl1wyif turn work repeat r17 a total of 6 times bind of from rs using your method of choice 2 jonatan tollow @madebytollow 2025 © #diamondbabyblanket contact info@madebytollow com
